means: 对抗，抵消( counteract的现在分词 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: To act as a counteracting force , influence , or weight to ; counterpoise ., 使平衡作为一种平衡力 , 影响或重量 ; 平衡.
But he notes that there are counteracting forces as well ., 但是他也指出还有一些抵消因素.
counteracting 反作用的, counteracting 相互作用的, counteracting 消解
权力与影响的7大策略 ... 施压强制(pressuring) 阻碍反击(counteracting) [责任编辑:bluefeather] ...-相关网页短语.

list.abs: counteraction 颉抗作用counteraction need 反败需求counterattitudinal 逆态度的
逆注 Counterflow Pouring逆治 counteracting treatment逆者正治 counter-action is straight treatment
1t1t.com网络游戏《无尽的任务EQ》专区 ... 燃烧大法 Combust 中和疾病 Counteract Disease 中和毒素 Counteract Poison.
counter-vailing duty 反贴补税counteracting force 反作用力counteraction 反作用

entry.def: To counteract something means to reduce its effect by doing something that produces an opposite effect.

example.ex: My husband has to take several pills to counteract high blood pressure...
example.tran: 我丈夫不得不吃几片药来降压。

example.ex: This event will counteract such trends.
example.tran: 这一事件将会削弱此类趋势。

auth_sentence.content: Here are some of the most common smoking triggers, and suggestions for counteracting them.

auth_sentence.content: That, too, was a kind of explosion, intended to unleash its readers' sexual potential by counteracting their ignorance and shame.

auth_sentence.content: "There's some other force out there or something on a cosmic scale that is counteracting the force of gravity, " Panek explained.
